Class Grid

java.lang.Object
Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Backend
public class Grid extends Object implements Backend
Management of the grid backend common to all cell games. Implements the interface Backend.

    • Grid

      public Grid(int height, int width, String gameName, Cell... cells)
      Constructor of a grid containing specific cells of the game choose.
      Parameters:
      height - Height of the grid.
      width - Width of the grid.
      gameName - Choice of the game.
      cells - Cells used in the grid.

    • getNeighbours

      public ArrayList<Cell> getNeighbours(int x, int y)
      Gives the list of neighbours of a cell.
      Parameters:
      x - Position of the cell on the grid on the x-axis.
      y - Position of the cell on the grid on the y-axis.
      Returns:
      The list of neighbours of a given cell, with interconnected edges.
